scripts.install: (cd books && npm install) & (cd orders && npm install) & (cd 'reverse_proxy' && npm install)
scripts.clean: (cd books && npm run clean) & (cd orders && npm run clean) & (cd 'reverse_proxy' && npm run clean)
scripts.dev: (cd books && npm start) & (cd orders && npm start) & (cd 'reverse_proxy' && npm start)
